name: untitled space program
description:
Ever wanted a way to build rockets and travel to space that is so simple, even a child could do it? Well, now it exists!

Containing over 20 parts to choose from, and a grid-based building system, creating rockets is as easy as click and launch. All you have to do then is... go up! There is an entire solar system out there, why not explore?

Other Features:

  • Staging
  • Astronaut
  • Satellites
  • Base building

All controls can be found within the game.
